sourceNote: Prototype baseline sourced from public City of Sydney outdoor dining guidance themes (footpath clearance and location-based assessment). Exact hours and area are confirmed by council during assessment.

local.label: Local street
local.clearanceRule: Keep a clear pedestrian through-route at all times (often 1.8m or more, subject to site checks).

high_street.label: High street / village main street
high_street.clearanceRule: Keep a wider pedestrian corridor where foot traffic is high; avoid pinch points near crossings and bus stops.

city_centre.label: City centre
city_centre.clearanceRule: High pedestrian flows usually require larger clearances and tighter furniture footprints.

special.label: Special precinct
special.typicalHours: Case-by-case with land manager and council
special.clearanceRule: The Rocks, Darling Harbour and Barangaroo may involve additional authority approval pathways.
